title: Because He Looks Good Enough To Die For - Novel Updates
tags: Doting Love Interests   Kidnappings   Oneshot   Possessive Characters   Stalkers   Stockholm Syndrome
author: Sekiguchi
description: I’ve been kidnapped and held captive in broad daylight by a man who claims to be a fan of mine. What should I do? The killer’s face is so good it’s killing me.>
